verses.name: Job 39:1
verses.text: Knowest thou the time when the wild goats of the rock bring forth? or canst thou mark when the hinds do calve?

verses.name: Job 39:2
verses.text: Canst thou number the months that they fulfil? or knowest thou the time when they bring forth?

verses.name: Job 39:3
verses.text: They bow themselves, they bring forth their young ones, they cast out their sorrows.

verses.name: Job 39:4
verses.text: Their young ones are in good liking, they grow up with corn; they go forth, and return not unto them.

verses.name: Job 39:5
verses.text: Who hath sent out the wild ass free? or who hath loosed the bands of the wild ass?
